string.value: Once you receive the #t4032471#, #p1013202#, a member of the Secret Organization, starts talking to you again. Respond to #p1013202#.

#p1013202# tells you to place the item you received under the #b#p2030015##k located at the #b#m211040400##k in #m211000000#. Once it is there, another member of the Secret Organization will come retrieve it... Go do as he says.
Looks like you've received something from #p2022003#. Thanks for your work. Now all you have to do is deliver that package to me. Oh, you don't need to come all the way to see me in person, though.
Have you ever heard of the #b#m211040400##k in #m211000000#? There's a #b#p2030015##k at the #m211040400#. Just go ahead and put the item under it, and another member will come and retrieve it.
Hmm. Alright, I'll assume you are very busy at this time. But don't make me wait for too long.
#b(There is a tree stump that looks rather suspicious. When you reach into it, you notice that it is hollow, as if man-made.)#k
#b(You push the key into the hollow space inside the tree stump.)#k
(The stump looks just like any other tree stump.)
Are you saying that you have yet to find the #p2030015#? All you have to do is place the item you received from #p2022003# under the #b#p2030015##k in #b#m211040400##k.
#b(There is a tree stump that looks rather suspicious. When you reach into it, you notice that it is hollow. It is man-made. #p1013202# told you to put the item there.)#k
